titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress supporting the Government of India's efforts to hold free and fair elections in Jammu and Kashmir.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: 4/5/1995--Introduced. Supports India's efforts to hold free and fair elections in Jammu and Kashmir. Urges: (1) all political parties to participate in such elections and democratically elect their representatives; and (2) the Government of Pakistan to work with the Government of India to adopt a constructive and joint approach to resolve the Kashmir problem.
